attributes.action: Put the carbohydrate content on all foods to enable type 1 diabetics carb count
attributes.additional_details: To enable children, young people, adults, parents and grandparents to be able to work out the correct amount of carbs in food as needed for the carbs to insulin ratio. To give people with type 1 diabetes better management of the condition and help to live a more normal life
attributes.background: Label all foods with the correct carbohydrate content per portion size to enable people with type 1 diabetes to accurately carb count as needed to work out the correct dose of insulin needed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317095
